notes: High accuracy multi-system emulator; uses .eeprom and .flash instead of common .eep and .fla extensions
More accurate than simple64; built-in netplay; successor to Simple64
Mupen64Plus frontend; superior to simple64 with GLideN64 plugin

save_extensions: RetroArch core; more compatible than ParaLLEl-N64; combines multiple save types into single .srm file
